TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CacheItemRemovedCallback(string key, object value, CacheItemRemovedReason reason);
.class public auto ansi sealed CacheItemRemovedCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CacheItemRemovedCallback(key As String, value As Object, reason As CacheItemRemovedReason)
public delegate void CacheItemRemovedCallback(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value, CacheItemRemovedReason reason);
type CacheItemRemovedCallback = delegate of string * obj * CacheItemRemovedReason -> unit

span.span: The key that is removed from the cache.

param.name: value
param.span: 与从缓存中移除的键关联的 项。

span.span: The item associated with the key removed from the cache.

param.name: reason
param.span: 枚举指定的、从缓存移除项的原因。

span.span: The reason the item was removed from the cache, as specified by the enumeration.

summary.span: 定义在从 移除缓存项时通知应用程序的回调方法。

span.span: Defines a callback method for notifying applications when a cached item is removed from the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个页面, 该页面向用户显示分配给缓存中某个项的值, 然后在从缓存中移除该项时发出通知。The following code example demonstrates a page that shows users the value assigned to an item in the cache and then notifies them when the item is removed from the cache. 它创建一个`RemovedCallback`方法, 该方法使用委托的签名, 以便在删除缓存项时通知用户, 并使用枚举告诉用户删除该缓存项的原因。It creates a `RemovedCallback` method, which uses the signature of the delegate, to notify users when the cache item is removed and uses the enumeration to tell them why it was removed. 此外, 它还使用属性将对象添加到缓存并检索这些对象的值。In addition, it uses the property to add objects to the cache and retrieve the value of those objects. 在方法中, 它使用方法将一项添加到缓存中。 `AddItemToCache`In the `AddItemToCache` method, it uses the method to add an item to the cache. 若要使用委托, 必须使用此方法或方法将一个项添加到缓存, 以便在移除该项时 ASP.NET 可以自动执行正确的方法调用。To use the delegate, you must add an item to the cache with this method or the method so that ASP.NET can automatically make the proper method calls when the item is removed. 自定义`RemoveItemFromCache`方法使用方法从缓存显式删除项, 从而导致`RemovedCallback`调用方法。The custom `RemoveItemFromCache` method uses the method to explicitly delete the item from the cache, causing the `RemovedCallback` method to be invoked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#1)]
